deployedGeneratedSources.name: #utility.yul

documentation.text:
Where all the custody expirations are stored 
 for oracle keepers to call on expiry 
keys = block.timestamp - (block.timestamp /x/ 86400 [seconds in a day]); -- this equation gives you the timestamp for start of day.

documentation.text:
Where all the custody expirations are stored 
 for oracle keepers to call on expiry 
keys = block.timestamp - (block.timestamp /x/ 86400 [seconds in a day]); -- this equation gives you the timestamp for start of day.
